definition: "walk slowly" component in Chinese characters/see also 冬字頭|冬字头[dong1 zi4 tou2]
to pass the winter/to overwinter/to live through the winter
wax gourd (Cucurbitaceae, Benincasa hispida)/white gourd/white hairy melon/Chinese squash
Winter Solstice, 22nd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 22nd December-5th January
the four seasons/spring, summer, autumn and winter

sentences.english: Winter cold wind, moon Leng Xing rare.
If unused, winter radishes run to seed in spring .
sentences.chinese: 如果不去动的话，冬萝卜会在春天开花结籽。

sentences.english: It's been a year-Winter, Summer, Spring and Fall.
sentences.chinese: 又是一年轮回，冬，夏，春，秋。

sentences.english: Heavy snow, cold frost; Winter buds, perseverant.
But you have to pay 5% commission on this money exchange.
sentences.chinese: 但兑换这笔外痹冬您得别的付5%的手续费。

sentences.english: Violin Concerto in F minor, Op. 8 No. 4 L'Inverno(Winter)
sentences.chinese: 小提琴协奏曲《冬》，F小调，作品8号之四。

sentences.english: The first stage, according to Yu, is what he jokingly calls "dumping".
sentences.chinese: 于冬将第一阶段打趣地称之为“低价倾销”。

sentences.english: Unlike courgettes and some other summer squashes , winter squash should not be eaten raw.
sentences.chinese: 冬南瓜不同于小胡瓜和其他夏南瓜，它不能生食。

sentences.english: Minute by spring cold winter to summer, always seen shimmering air.
sentences.chinese: 寒来暑经春复冬，看得浮生总是空。

sentences.english: Rolling in the Yangtze River winter, spray hero.
sentences.chinese: 滚滚长江冬逝水，浪花淘尽英雄。

sentences.english: The taste of winter grow more enchanting.
Even when autumn passed into winter, Kai went through the whole season as a bad boy.
sentences.chinese: 从秋到冬，凯在整个季节里都像个坏孩子。

sentences.english: Q. What have you learned from the inclusion of Wintergrasp in Wrath of the Lich King?
sentences.chinese: 你们从巫妖王之怒的冬拥湖中学到了什么？

sentences.english: The last Imperial family was the Qing Imperial family Aisin Gioro and the last Chinese Emperor was Puyi.
sentences.chinese: 最后的皇室是清皇试冬爱新觉罗荚冬溥仪是末代天子。

sentences.english: No snow in winter, lonely, dryness, such as dark and yellow skin, dry and rough.
sentences.chinese: 无雪的冬，寂寞，干涩，如暗黄的肌肤，缺水而粗糙。

definition: to rustle in the air/to rustle/to sough/bleak/desolate/chilly
Lidong or Start of Winter, 19th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st November
early autumn/7th month of the lunar calendar
